title: Start
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Well, there you have it folks. We've heard both sides of the story. What do we think?

[[...|dingeropts]]
<<CharExpression|happy>>

title: dingeropts
coreysympathy
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Corey, I feel for you, I really do. You're a boy ripped in two. But you're a fighter and I believe in you.

[[...|coreyquestions]]
<<AudienceReaction|neutral>>
<<CharExpression|happy>>

title: coreyquestions
coreyq1
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Corey, what can your brother do to win you back over to his side? I get the feeling he wants to make amends.

[[...|coreya1]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>
<<CharExpression|neutral>>

title: coreya1
body:
{CoreyMcCormack}
That's easy, Joey! If we are gonna be friends again, he has to come play soccer with me in the park.

[[...|coreya1b]]
<<CharExpression|happy>>

title: coreya1b
body:
{CoreyMcCormack}
Yeah, that's right, he's gotta play soccer with me. And drink sodas! If he's truly Carey, my twin brother, he'll send me my favourite Tik-tok meme, right now!

[[...|tiktok]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>
<<CharExpression|happy>>

title: tiktok
body:
{Player}
[[Ask another question|coreyquestions]]
[[Get Carey to send a Tik-tok meme|tiktok2]]
<<AudienceReaction|neutral>>

title: tiktok2
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Well, Carey, how about it? All you have to do is get out your phone and send a video to your brother. Think you can do that?

[[...|careytiktok]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>
<<CharExpression|happy>>

title: careytiktok
body:
{CareyMcCormack}
Sure, Joey. I know all about tik tok. Tik tok, tik tok, I'm a little cuckoo clock.

[[...|careytiktok2]]
<<CharExpression|mad>>

title: careytiktok2
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Well, go on then. Your brother is waiting.

[[...|careytiktok3]]
<<CharExpression|mad>>

title: careytiktok3
body:
{CareyMcCormack}
.......

[[...|careytiktok4]]
<<CharExpression|neutral>>

title: careytiktok4
careytiktok5
body:
{CareyMcCormack}
I may have a little confession to make.

[[...|careyconfession]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>

title: careyconfession
body:
{CareyMcCormack}
I haven't been totally honest with you Joey.

[[...|careyconfession2]]
<<AudienceReaction|mad>>

title: careyconfession2
careyconfession3
body:
{CareyMcCormack}
I don't know what that is.

[[...|joeyresponse]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>
<<CharExpression|sad>>

title: joeyresponse
hardball
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Well, I can't say I'm surprised, Carey. You are clearly not a fourteen year-old boy.
[[...|careyconfresponse]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>
<<CharExpression|mad>>

title: coreyq2
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Corey, I want to offer you all the support and encouragement that I can. The feeling of a loved one drifting away is not pleasant at all.

[[...|coreyq2a]]
<<AudienceReaction|neutral>>

title: careyconfresponse
joeyresponse2
moustacheco
body:
{{JoeyDinger}}
I don't know about that, Carey. I mean, Corey, did he have that moustache before you went on your trip?
[[...|moustacheco1]]
<<CharExpression|neutral>>

title: moustacheco1
body:
{CoreyMcCormack}
Hey, come to think of it, he didn't have the moustache before the trip. I never even thought about it before!
[[...|identityb]]
<<CharExpression|mad>>

title: wrapup
wrapupjoey
heartfelt
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Sorry to say folks, but that's just about all the time we've got for mending the rift between these once-close twin brothers.

[[...|heartfelt2]]
<<AudienceReaction|mad>>
<<CharExpression|neutral>>

title: heartfelt2
body:
{JoeyDinger}
What can we learn from this tragic story?
[[...|heartfelt3]]
<<CharExpression|happy>>

title: heartfelt3
heartfelt4
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Ladies and gentlemen, I'll see you on the next one.
[[End|endScene]]
<<CharExpression|happy>>

title: attackcarey
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Carey, I've got to be honest; I have some serious questions for you.
[[...|careyquestions]]
<<AudienceReaction|neutral>>
<<CharExpression|mad>>

title: careyquestions
identity
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Are you really, one-hundred percent, the real Carey?

[[...|careya1]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>
<<CharExpression|neutral>>

title: careya1
body:
{CareyMcCormack}
What?! Of course I'm the real Carey. It hurts me, deeply that anyone would think otherwise.

[[...|proof]]
<<AudienceReaction|mad>>
<<CharExpression|mad>>

title: proof
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Okay, so if that's true, can you prove it?

[[...|proof1]]
<<AudienceReaction|neutral>>

title: proof1
body:
{CareyMcCormack}
Prove it? I fought in 'nam, I don't need to prove anything to you! I'm a red-blooded American boy!

[[...|proof2]]
<<AudienceReaction|mad>>
<<CharExpression|mad>>

title: proof2
body:
{JoeyDinger}
You're still coming off a little disingenuous there, Carey.

[[...|joeyresponse2]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>
<<CharExpression|neutral>>

title: coreyq2a
resolution1
corey4qa
body:
{CareyMcCormack}
Sure I do, Joey. He's my brother after all!

[[...|corey4qb]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>
